name: Gently Down the Marsh
description:
Row, row, row your boat,
gently down the marsh.
Quietly, caref...

Oh hey, I didn't see you there!

  

Welcome!

This is a game three friends made together during an 8-hour mini-jam.

It is the story of four companions in a canoe, each with their own oar, two to a side. Well, they can switch sides by double tapping their key but they must coordinate and work together to navigate through the twisting bends, the rushing rapids and the hazardous debris. 

The goal? The goal is to reach the end! We don't know what's on the other side, but we keep hearing the grass is greener there. I guess there's only one way to find out!

All together:

Row, row, row your boat,
gently down the marsh.
Quietly, carefully, slowly, gently,
failure can be harsh.

- @joisigurdss, @joonturbo & @torfias

Controls

Player controls are displayed in the beginning, but for clarity's sake, the key for each player position is: Q R U & P

  • Tap and Hold Q, R, U or P to row each oar respectively
  • Double Tap Q, R, U or P to switch sides respectively
